code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/Jon/Downloads/guernsey-payroll-frontend-full/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddEmployee(){const[form,setForm]=useState({name:'',nin:'',gross_salary:'',start_date:''});const handleChange=e=>setForm(_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},form),{},{[e.target.name]:e.target.value}));const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();fetch('/api/employers/1/employees',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(form)}).then(res=>res.ok&&alert('Employee added!'));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Add Employee"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",placeholder:"Name",onChange:handleChange,className:"border p-2 w-full",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"nin",placeholder:"NIN",onChange:handleChange,className:"border p-2 w-full",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"gross_salary",placeholder:"Gross Salary",onChange:handleChange,className:"border p-2 w-full",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"start_date",type:"date",onChange:handleChange,className:"border p-2 w-full",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Add Employee"})]})]});}export default AddEmployee;
